title: So I did the arcade mission that says I need to win one to get an icon
body: Like it says in the title I need some help, the icon in which you are awarded to by completing Villains Rule didn't appear in my summoner's icon list. And I'm trying to do the missions to get tickets and I can't without the icon. Is it a bug and is there a possible solution to this? Also tell me if anyone else has this problem.

replies.body: Ah thank you BroPoro I know this is late but it was successfully delivered I cannot thank you enough.

Gaming poros don't quite make the best delivery service people as it turns out...

I've got another squad being sent out to make sure those icons are delivered properly. Let me know if you still don't have yours by now though!

Same thing with me.
When I entered game no arcade missions were available, but when i finished I had been notified that I completed the first mission.
I went to check on my icons and nothing was there.
Fix this fast Rito pls.
